# Description

My research can be summarized as application and development of machine learning methods for business problems. These methods include natural language processing, recommender systems, reinforcement learning, and deep neural networks. I hope to be involved in open science at a very substantial level, as I think that absence of reproducibility and transparency are the two main challenges scientific production face.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Ibrahim Cikrikcioglu"
special_skill <- c("R", "cat lover", "piano")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open source software", all_of(special_skill), "data management", "open access", "data sharing", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
